title: Apple Mint Nicotine Pouches by Klint
description: TRY KLINT APPLE MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Apple Mint Nicotine Pouches by Klint features the perfect blend of fresh granny smith apple taste and extra-strong menthol flavour. While the apple tang creates a clean and delightful tingle that lasts. View all Klint Nicotine Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Low Strength Pouches KEY FEATURES: Apple flavoured nicotine pouches 14 mg nicotine strength Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT LIME FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES With a hearty apple and ice flavour tastes like one of the most popular fruits on the market. combined with excellent ice nicotine satisfaction . The pouches may give your lip a tingly feeling, but don't worry, that's completely normal and part of the experience. MORE ABOUT KLINT NICOTINE POUCHES Klint is the premium, all-white, tobacco-free nicotine portion for the elegant lifestyle that gives you the convenience of a fresh nicotine boost, wherever you are, whenever you want. Simply choose from one of the six flavours that best matches your taste, place it under your lip and get on with your day. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Klint Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch): 14 MG Flavour Name: Apple Mint Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
